channel.title: [RESOLVED] Ban Request - Trolling, intentionally leaving at start
channel.description:
What happened: They joined with the name "Leavign game" and left as soon as the game started.
[https://puu.sh/ybOfG/ab8a9b5016.png](https://puu.sh/ybOfG/ab8a9b5016.png) [https://puu.sh/ybPpG/063e57a3a8.png](https://puu.sh/ybPpG/063e57a3a8.png)
